name: InfluenzaVaccineAdministrationSNOMEDCT
title: Influenza Vaccine Administration SNOMED CT
description: Developed by OFMQ for Immunization measures
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values identifies patients who are administered the influenza vaccination.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to represent the procedure of administering the influenza vaccine.  Using the Quality Data Model, this data element maps to the Procedure category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only include codes which represent the procedure of administering a vaccine.  Codes used are to be SNOMED-CT  codes only.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes that do not meet the inclusion criteria.)

concept.display: Administration of vaccine to produce active immunity (procedure)

contains.display: Administration of vaccine to produce active immunity (procedure)
Administration of vaccine product containing only Influenza virus antigen (procedure)
